metadata.feature_description: Configure whether comments require approval before publication for Blogs, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events, and Wiki modules.

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Settings > Community Settings
steps.expected: Community Settings panel opens with Comment Moderation section visible
steps.actual: Community Settings panel opened successfully showing Comment Moderation section with all 5 checkboxes (Blogs, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events, Wiki) enabled

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable comment moderation for Blogs module

steps.action: Uncheck the Blogs checkbox in Comment Moderation section

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable comment moderation for Discussions module

steps.action: Uncheck the Discussions checkbox in Comment Moderation section

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable comment moderation for Ideas module

steps.action: Uncheck the Ideas checkbox in Comment Moderation section

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable comment moderation for Social Events module

steps.action: Uncheck the Social Events checkbox in Comment Moderation section
steps.actual: Social Events checkbox was successfully unchecked

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable comment moderation for Wiki module

steps.action: Uncheck the Wiki checkbox in Comment Moderation section

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Save all comment moderation settings and verify persistence

steps.action: Click Save button after disabling all comment moderation options
steps.expected: Settings are saved successfully with confirmation message
steps.actual: Success message 'Item successfully saved.' displayed confirming the save operation

steps.action: Refresh the page and navigate back to Community Settings
steps.expected: All Comment Moderation checkboxes should remain unchecked after page reload
steps.actual: After page refresh, all 5 Comment Moderation checkboxes (Blogs, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events, Wiki) remained unchecked, confirming persistence

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable comment moderation for Blogs module

steps.action: Check the Blogs checkbox in Comment Moderation section

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable comment moderation for Discussions module

steps.action: Check the Discussions checkbox in Comment Moderation section

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable comment moderation for Ideas module

steps.action: Check the Ideas checkbox in Comment Moderation section

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable comment moderation for Social Events module

steps.action: Check the Social Events checkbox in Comment Moderation section
steps.actual: Social Events checkbox was successfully checked

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable comment moderation for Wiki module

steps.action: Check the Wiki checkbox in Comment Moderation section
steps.actual: Wiki checkbox was successfully checked and settings saved successfully

observations: The Comment Moderation feature supports 5 module types: Blogs, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events, and Wiki
All checkboxes are independent and can be toggled individually
Settings are persisted correctly after save and page reload
The UI provides clear visual feedback with checkbox states and success messages
The feature is located under Admin > Settings > Community Settings in the PersonaBar
